title: 刘遵峰课题组 | SMALL-南大功能高分子材料教育部重点实验室
content: 刘遵峰课题组 | SMALL-南大功能高分子材料教育部重点实验室 首页实验室概况实验室简介组织结构学术委员会教授委员会新闻动态实验室新闻实验室动态行业动态研究团队人员概况师资队伍科研团队科技创新科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文学术交流交流与合作举办学术会议学术活动通知仪器平台实验室大型仪器学校仪器平台开放基金开放基金开放基金项目运行管理工作年报运行管理办法评估规则实验室规章制度文件下载  新闻动态科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文  近期发表论文当前位置：首页     > 科技创新     > 近期发表论文     >         正文刘遵峰课题组 | SMALL发布人：    发布时间：2024/12/30   浏览次数：  次Cocklebur-Inspired Robust Non-flammable Polymer Thermo Conductor for CPU CoolingByWang, YB (Wang, Yongbin) [1] ; Fan, Y (Fan, Yong) [1] ; Pan, KC (Pan, Kaichao) [1] ; Liu, ZF (Liu, Zunfeng) [2] ; Zhao, WQ (Zhao, Weiqiang) [2] ; Zhou, X (Zhou, Xiang) [3] ; Qiu, J (Qiu, Jun) [1]SourceSMALL        arrow_drop_down       DOI10.1002/smll.202405971Early AccessDEC 2024Indexed2024-12-22Document TypeArticle; Early AccessJump to    arrow_downward   Enriched Cited ReferencesAbstractEfficient computer central processing units (CPUs) heat dissipation demands polymer-based thermal interface materials that combine high thermal conductivity with strong mechanical properties, eliminating the need for additional fasteners. However, polymers with high thermal conductivity often suffer from insufficient mechanical strength and other challenges, including high production costs, elevated interfacial thermal resistance, and flammability. Inspired by the 3D "spininess-seeds-bark" structure of cocklebur, cast polyurethane (PUC) composites are developed using copper ethylenediamine methylene-phosphonate as the "spininess" and functionalized alumina microspheres as the "seeds" filler. This spininess configuration prevents organophosphate self-polymerization, imparting self-extinguishing properties to the polymer, while also enhancing the mechanical strength and thermal conductivity by connecting the "seeds" to the matrix. The bark-like structure enables effective interlocking of functional particles, optimizing the synergy within the composite. The elevated surface reduces interfacial thermal resistance, leading to enhanced thermal conductivity. The resulting PUC composites demonstrate impressive performance, with a tensile strength of 15.9 MPa and thermal conductivity of 2.51 W m(-)(1) K--(1), providing effective continuous cooling for high-power CPUs. These composites offer low density, broad availability, and environmental sustainability, making them promising candidates for sustainable electronics and new energy applications, aligned with global development strategies.上一篇：刘永胜课题组 | ACS ENERGY LETTERS下一篇：陈永胜课题组 |  RUSSIAN CHEMICAL BULLETINCopyright 功能高分子材料教育部重点实验室  版权所有 天津市卫津路94号 　　　--相关链接--中华人民共和国教育部                    中华人民共和国科学技术部                    国家自然科学基金委员会                    ————————                    天津市科学技术委员会                    天津市自然科学基金                    ————————                    南开大学                    南开大学科学技术处                    南开大学化学学院                    刘遵峰课题组 | SMALL-南大功能高分子材料教育部重点实验室 首页实验室概况实验室简介组织结构学术委员会教授委员会新闻动态实验室新闻实验室动态行业动态研究团队人员概况师资队伍科研团队科技创新科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文学术交流交流与合作举办学术会议学术活动通知仪器平台实验室大型仪器学校仪器平台开放基金开放基金开放基金项目运行管理工作年报运行管理办法评估规则实验室规章制度文件下载  新闻动态科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文  近期发表论文当前位置：首页     > 科技创新     > 近期发表论文     >         正文刘遵峰课题组 | SMALL发布人：    发布时间：2024/12/30   浏览次数：  次Cocklebur-Inspired Robust Non-flammable Polymer Thermo Conductor for CPU CoolingByWang, YB (Wang, Yongbin) [1] ; Fan, Y (Fan, Yong) [1] ; Pan, KC (Pan, Kaichao) [1] ; Liu, ZF (Liu, Zunfeng) [2] ; Zhao, WQ (Zhao, Weiqiang) [2] ; Zhou, X (Zhou, Xiang) [3] ; Qiu, J (Qiu, Jun) [1]SourceSMALL        arrow_drop_down       DOI10.1002/smll.202405971Early AccessDEC 2024Indexed2024-12-22Document TypeArticle; Early AccessJump to    arrow_downward   Enriched Cited ReferencesAbstractEfficient computer central processing units (CPUs) heat dissipation demands polymer-based thermal interface materials that combine high thermal conductivity with strong mechanical properties, eliminating the need for additional fasteners. However, polymers with high thermal conductivity often suffer from insufficient mechanical strength and other challenges, including high production costs, elevated interfacial thermal resistance, and flammability. Inspired by the 3D "spininess-seeds-bark" structure of cocklebur, cast polyurethane (PUC) composites are developed using copper ethylenediamine methylene-phosphonate as the "spininess" and functionalized alumina microspheres as the "seeds" filler. This spininess configuration prevents organophosphate self-polymerization, imparting self-extinguishing properties to the polymer, while also enhancing the mechanical strength and thermal conductivity by connecting the "seeds" to the matrix. The bark-like structure enables effective interlocking of functional particles, optimizing the synergy within the composite. The elevated surface reduces interfacial thermal resistance, leading to enhanced thermal conductivity. The resulting PUC composites demonstrate impressive performance, with a tensile strength of 15.9 MPa and thermal conductivity of 2.51 W m(-)(1) K--(1), providing effective continuous cooling for high-power CPUs. These composites offer low density, broad availability, and environmental sustainability, making them promising candidates for sustainable electronics and new energy applications, aligned with global development strategies.上一篇：刘永胜课题组 | ACS ENERGY LETTERS下一篇：陈永胜课题组 |  RUSSIAN CHEMICAL BULLETINCopyright 功能高分子材料教育部重点实验室  版权所有 天津市卫津路94号 　　　--相关链接--中华人民共和国教育部                    中华人民共和国科学技术部                    国家自然科学基金委员会                    ————————                    天津市科学技术委员会                    天津市自然科学基金                    ————————                    南开大学                    南开大学科学技术处                    南开大学化学学院                    首页实验室概况实验室简介组织结构学术委员会教授委员会新闻动态实验室新闻实验室动态行业动态研究团队人员概况师资队伍科研团队科技创新科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文学术交流交流与合作举办学术会议学术活动通知仪器平台实验室大型仪器学校仪器平台开放基金开放基金开放基金项目运行管理工作年报运行管理办法评估规则实验室规章制度文件下载首页首页实验室概况实验室简介组织结构学术委员会教授委员会实验室概况实验室简介组织结构学术委员会教授委员会实验室简介实验室简介组织结构组织结构学术委员会学术委员会教授委员会教授委员会新闻动态实验室新闻实验室动态行业动态新闻动态实验室新闻实验室动态行业动态实验室新闻实验室新闻实验室动态实验室动态行业动态行业动态研究团队人员概况师资队伍科研团队研究团队人员概况师资队伍科研团队人员概况人员概况师资队伍师资队伍科研团队科研团队科技创新科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文科技创新科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文科研课题科研课题自主创新自主创新科研论文科研论文成果奖励成果奖励近期发表论文近期发表论文学术交流交流与合作举办学术会议学术活动通知学术交流交流与合作举办学术会议学术活动通知交流与合作交流与合作举办学术会议举办学术会议学术活动通知学术活动通知仪器平台实验室大型仪器学校仪器平台仪器平台实验室大型仪器学校仪器平台实验室大型仪器实验室大型仪器学校仪器平台学校仪器平台开放基金开放基金开放基金项目开放基金开放基金开放基金项目开放基金开放基金开放基金项目开放基金项目运行管理工作年报运行管理办法评估规则实验室规章制度文件下载运行管理工作年报运行管理办法评估规则实验室规章制度文件下载工作年报工作年报运行管理办法运行管理办法评估规则评估规则实验室规章制度实验室规章制度文件下载文件下载  新闻动态科研课题自主创新科研论文成果奖励近期发表论文  近期发表论文当前位置：首页     > 科技创新     > 近期发表论文     >         正文刘遵峰课题组 | SMALL发布人：    发布时间：2024/12/30   浏览次数：  次Cocklebur-Inspired Robust Non-flammable Polymer Thermo Conductor for CPU CoolingByWang, YB (Wang, Yongbin) [1] ; The resulting PUC composites demonstrate impressive performance, with a tensile strength of 15.9 MPa and thermal conductivity of 2.51 W m(-)(1) K--(1), providing effective continuous cooling for high-power CPUs. These composites offer low density, broad availability, and environmental sustainability, making them promising candidates for sustainable electronics and new energy applications, aligned with global development strategies.上一篇：刘永胜课题组 | ACS ENERGY LETTERS下一篇：陈永胜课题组 |  RUSSIAN CHEMICAL BULLETIN刘遵峰课题组 | SMALL发布人：    发布时间：2024/12/30   浏览次数：  次Cocklebur-Inspired Robust Non-flammable Polymer Thermo Conductor for CPU CoolingByWang, YB (Wang, Yongbin) [1] ; Fan, Y (Fan, Yong) [1] ; Pan, KC (Pan, Kaichao) [1] ; Liu, ZF (Liu, Zunfeng) [2] ; Zhao, WQ (Zhao, Weiqiang) [2] ; Zhou, X (Zhou, Xiang) [3] ; Qiu, J (Qiu, Jun) [1]SourceSMALL        arrow_drop_down       DOI10.1002/smll.202405971Early AccessDEC 2024Indexed2024-12-22Document TypeArticle; Early AccessJump to    arrow_downward   Enriched Cited ReferencesAbstractEfficient computer central processing units (CPUs) heat dissipation demands polymer-based thermal interface materials that combine high thermal conductivity with strong mechanical properties, eliminating the need for additional fasteners. However, polymers with high thermal conductivity often suffer from insufficient mechanical strength and other challenges, including high production costs, elevated interfacial thermal resistance, and flammability. Inspired by the 3D "spininess-seeds-bark" structure of cocklebur, cast polyurethane (PUC) composites are developed using copper ethylenediamine methylene-phosphonate as the "spininess" and functionalized alumina microspheres as the "seeds" filler. This spininess configuration prevents organophosphate self-polymerization, imparting self-extinguishing properties to the polymer, while also enhancing the mechanical strength and thermal conductivity by connecting the "seeds" to the matrix. The bark-like structure enables effective interlocking of functional particles, optimizing the synergy within the composite. The elevated surface reduces interfacial thermal resistance, leading to enhanced thermal conductivity. The resulting PUC composites demonstrate impressive performance, with a tensile strength of 15.9 MPa and thermal conductivity of 2.51 W m(-)(1) K--(1), providing effective continuous cooling for high-power CPUs. These composites offer low density, broad availability, and environmental sustainability, making them promising candidates for sustainable electronics and new energy applications, aligned with global development strategies.AbstractEfficient computer central processing units (CPUs) heat dissipation demands polymer-based thermal interface materials that combine high thermal conductivity with strong mechanical properties, eliminating the need for additional fasteners. The resulting PUC composites demonstrate impressive performance, with a tensile strength of 15.9 MPa and thermal conductivity of 2.51 W m(-)(1) K--(1), providing effective continuous cooling for high-power CPUs.
